help_topics.title: Module Assessments
help_topics.content: Each tutorial module includes an assessment to test your understanding. You need to score at least 70% to pass and unlock the next module.

help_topics.title: How Scoring Works
help_topics.content: Questions are worth different points based on difficulty. Easy questions are worth 10 points, medium questions 15 points, and hard questions 20 points. Your final score is calculated as a percentage of total points.

help_topics.title: Using Hints
help_topics.content: Each question has three progressive hints. Click the lightbulb icon to reveal hints one at a time. Using hints doesn't affect your score, so don't hesitate to use them if you're stuck!

help_topics.title: Retaking Assessments
help_topics.content: You can retake any assessment as many times as you want. Your best score is always saved. Use retakes to improve your understanding and achieve a perfect score!

help_topics.title: Question Types
help_topics.content: Assessments include multiple choice questions, true/false questions, code challenges, and fill-in-the-blank questions. Each type tests different aspects of your knowledge.

help_topics.title: Production Readiness Assessment
help_topics.content: After completing all modules, take the Production Readiness Assessment to evaluate your overall expertise. This comprehensive evaluation provides detailed feedback on your strengths and areas for improvement.

help_topics.title: Proficiency Levels
help_topics.content: Your readiness is rated on five levels: Beginner (0-39%), Intermediate (40-59%), Proficient (60-74%), Expert (75-89%), and Master (90-100%). Each level indicates your production readiness.

help_topics.title: Skill Areas
help_topics.content: Your expertise is evaluated across four skill areas: Fundamentals (25%), Vector Search (30%), Optimization (25%), and Production (20%). Each area represents critical knowledge for production use.

help_topics.title: Completion Certificate
help_topics.content: Score 60% or higher on the readiness assessment to earn a certificate. You can download, print, or share your certificate on social media to showcase your expertise.

help_topics.title: Achievement System
help_topics.content: Earn achievements by completing modules, scoring perfectly, finishing quickly, and more. Achievements are ranked in four tiers: Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Platinum.

help_topics.title: Achievement Tiers
help_topics.content: Bronze achievements (10 pts) are for basic milestones. Silver (25 pts) for consistent progress. Gold (50 pts) for mastery. Platinum (100 pts) for exceptional achievements.

help_topics.title: Achievement Categories
help_topics.content: Achievements are organized into categories: Milestone, Mastery, Speed, Consistency, Exploration, Social, Special, Challenge, Time-based, and Persistence.

help_topics.title: Tutorial Navigation
help_topics.content: Navigate through tutorial modules using the sidebar menu. Complete each module in order, as later modules build on earlier concepts. Your progress is automatically saved.

help_topics.title: Progress Tracking
help_topics.content: Your progress is automatically saved to your browser's local storage. This includes assessment scores, unlocked achievements, and module completion status.

help_topics.title: Unlocking Modules
help_topics.content: Complete each module's assessment with a passing score (70%+) to unlock the next module. This ensures you have the necessary foundation before moving forward.

help_topics.title: Vector Database Basics
help_topics.content: Vector databases store data as high-dimensional vectors and use similarity search to find related items. They're essential for AI applications, semantic search, and recommendation systems.

help_topics.title: JadeVectorDB Features
help_topics.content: JadeVectorDB offers fast vector search, multiple index types (HNSW, IVF, Flat), horizontal scaling, real-time updates, and hybrid search combining vector and metadata filtering.

help_topics.title: Common Use Cases
help_topics.content: Vector databases power semantic search, recommendation engines, image similarity, document retrieval, anomaly detection, and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) for LLMs.

help_topics.title: Performance Optimization
help_topics.content: Optimize performance by choosing the right index type, tuning query parameters, using appropriate vector dimensions, implementing caching, and scaling horizontally.

help_topics.title: Production Best Practices
help_topics.content: For production deployments: monitor query latency, implement proper error handling, use connection pooling, set up backups, plan for scaling, and test thoroughly before launch.

help_topics.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
help_topics.content: Press F1 or ? to open help overlay. Press ESC to close overlays. Use Tab to navigate between input fields in assessments.

help_topics.title: Troubleshooting
help_topics.content: If you experience issues: refresh the page to reload data, check that JavaScript is enabled, clear browser cache if data seems stale, or try a different browser.

quiz-question.title: Answering Questions
quiz-question.content: Select your answer and click 'Submit Answer'. Use hints if you're stuck - they won't affect your score!

quiz-results.title: Your Results
quiz-results.content: Review your performance. Click 'Retry' to improve your score or 'Continue' to proceed if you passed.

readiness-overview.title: Readiness Overview
readiness-overview.content: This assessment evaluates your overall expertise across all modules. Take your time and do your best!

achievement-badge.title: Achievement Badge
achievement-badge.content: Hover over badges to see details. Gray badges are locked - complete their requirements to unlock them!

certificate.title: Your Certificate
certificate.content: Download, print, or share your certificate to showcase your JadeVectorDB expertise!

skills-checklist.title: Skills Checklist
skills-checklist.content: Track your progress across all required skills. Green items are complete, orange items need improvement.

recommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
recommendations.content: Follow these recommendations to strengthen weak areas and advance to the next proficiency level.

quick_tips: You can retake any assessment to improve your score
Hints don't reduce your score - use them freely!
Complete all modules to unlock the Production Readiness Assessment
Achievements are saved automatically as you progress
Your best score for each module is always saved
Press F1 or ? anytime to open help
Aim for 90%+ to achieve Master proficiency
Each module builds on previous concepts - complete them in order
Share your certificate on LinkedIn to showcase your skills
